cs125.cpuss.gonzalvo_marasigan.models

Class SchedulingAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs125.cpuss.gonzalvo_marasigan.models.SchedulingAlgorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FCFS, PrioSched, RR, SJF_P

    public abstract class SchedulingAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the CPU scheduling algorithms namely, First Come, First Serve Scheduling; Non-preemptive Shortest Job First Scheduling; Preemptive Shortest Job First Scheduling; Non-preemptive Priority Scheduling; Preemptive priority Scheduling, and; Round-Robin Scheduling.
    Author:
    Gonzalvo, J.; Marasigan, M.
    See Also:
    http://www.cs.columbia.edu/~junfeng/10sp-w4118/lectures/l13-sched.pdf
